(It <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> that <S%G3137>Mary<s%> which <S%G218>anointed<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> with <S%G3464>ointment,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1591>wiped<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%> with <S%G848>her<s%> <S%G2359>hair,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G2976>Lazarus<s%> was <S%G770>sick.)<s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> his <S%G79>sisters<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2396>behold,<s%> he <S%G3739>whom<s%> thou <S%G5368>lovest<s%> is <S%G770>sick.<s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> that, he <S%G2036>said,<s%> This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G769>sickness<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> might be <S%G1392>glorified<s%> thereby. <S%G1223><s%> <S%G846><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G3136>Martha,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G79>sister,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2976>Lazarus.<s%>

Then <S%G1899><s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> he to his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> Let us <S%G71>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2449>Judea<s%> again. <S%G3825><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G3767><s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3954>plainly,<s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> is dead. <S%G599><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I am <S%G5463>glad<s%> for your sakes <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5209><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G2252>was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1563>there,<s%> to the <S%G2443>intent<s%> ye may <S%G4100>believe;<s%> <S%G235>nevertheless<s%> let us <S%G71>go<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2381>Thomas,<s%> which is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G1324>Didymus,<s%> unto his fellow <S%G4827>disciples,<s%> Let <S%G2249>us<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G71>go,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> we may <S%G599>die<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> he <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G846>that<s%> he <S%G2192>had<s%> lain <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3419>grave<s%> <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G2235>already.<s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G963>Bethany<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> nigh <S%G1451>unto<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G5613>about<s%> <S%G1178>fifteen<s%> <S%G4712>furlongs<s%> off: <S%G575><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3136>Martha<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3137>Mary,<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G3888>comfort<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G80>brother.<s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3136>Martha,<s%> as soon <S%G5613>as<s%> she <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G2064>coming,<s%> went and <S%G5221>met<s%> <S%G846>him:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G2516>sat<s%> still <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3624>house.<s%>

Martha <S%G3136><s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he shall rise <S%G450>again<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G386>resurrection<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>

As soon <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1565>she<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> that, she <S%G1453>arose<s%> <S%G5035>quickly,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G1145>wept.<s%>
Then <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G2396>Behold<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> he <S%G5368>loved<s%> <S%G846>him!<s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> Take ye <S%G142>away<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> stone. <S%G3037><s%> <S%G3136>Martha,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G79>sister<s%> of him that was <S%G2348>dead,<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> by this <S%G2235>time<s%> he <S%G3605>stinketh:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> he hath <S%G2076>been<s%> dead four <S%G5066>days.<s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> they took <S%G142>away<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3037>stone<s%> from the place <S%G3757>where<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2348>dead<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G2749>laid.<s%> <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G142>lifted<s%> <S%G507>up<s%> his <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> I <S%G2168>thank<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> thou hast <S%G191>heard<s%> me. <S%G3450><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1492>knew<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> thou <S%G191>hearest<s%> <S%G3450>me<s%> always: <S%G3842><s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>people<s%> which stand <S%G4026>by<s%> I <S%G2036>said<s%> it, <S%G2443>that<s%> they may <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> hast <S%G649>sent<s%> me. <S%G3165><s%>
